entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:50 p.m. MST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blizzard developing in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 in the evening except east 80 near the Richardson mountains late in the evening and overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Windy. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Windy. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Blowing snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 20 April 2023
